title: Hulk Hogan's Celebrity Championship Wrestling S01E06 HDTV MP4
description:
VinceMcMahon316 presents the following SDH release for the wrestling fans around the world.

from the original nfo file:



Hulk Hogan&#039;s Celebrity Championship Wrestling S01E06 HDTV MP4-SC-SDH


S01E06 - In-Ring Psychology 

When the celebrities go on a field trip, they prepare for their next match and let out a little built-up frustration toward each other. But when someone shows up from their past, the frustration resurfaces for some and Hulk Hogan is forced to step in and take charge. Special guest Former WCW and WWE Champion Bill Goldberg motivates the celebrities -- some with words and others with pure pain.



This is SDH release #542 for the wrestling fans from a wrestling fan.
First Aired and Captured on: 11/22/2008 on the CMT HD channel
on DirecTv HDTV Digital Satellite Broadcast then converted to 
16:9 widescreen 624 x 352 resolution 
in a 350mb Nero Digital .mp4 release 
with 128 kbps mp3 audio
This SDH release is Philips DVD - DivX player model # DVP3962 compatible 


Also I want to address an issue I have with this program. DirecTv claims CMT HD is broadcasted in HDTV but in reality it is NOT broadcasted in 16:9 widescreen it is broadcasted in 4:3 fullscreen with the black pillar bars on the left and right side of the screen which clearly indicate that it is simply being upconverted to HD but upconverted 480i programming is not TRUE HDTV sad but true. Also this program has black bars not just on the left and right but top and bottom as well during the broadcast which puts the program in a box surrounded by black bars. I will do the best I can to make a decent widescreen release out of this show but if it comes out looking bad then you can blame it on CMT which are a bunch of IDIOTS who claim it is in widescreen HD when it is NOT broadcasted in HD. 

Also I resent the fact that the scene group aAF claims it is HDTV when I have clearly proved that it isn&#039;t in HDTV. If anyone from the scene group aAF wants to dispute this fact then JUST BRING IT because I will be waiting for you aAF jabroni&#039;s to PROVE ME WRONG. I base my facts on this webpage:  <a href=" http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_Music_Television" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Country_Music_Television</a>  

which CLEARLY states on the right hand side of the page that it is: 

Country Music Television, Inc. (CMT) 
Launched March 5, 1983 
Owned by Viacom 
Picture format 480i (SDTV) 
Headquarters Nashville, Tennessee, United States 


StoneCold420
SmackDownHotel
November 22, 2008
